ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: CONTAINS(RecordType.Name, 'Collection AMFS') && $Profile.Name='Outbound Collection Agent-AMFS' && ISCHANGED( Call_Status_Config__c) && ISPICKVAL(PRIORVALUE(Status_has_call__c),'Closed')
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Can't Edit Call Status if Previous Status Has Call is Closed..Please contact Supervisor!
